title: Castle in the Sky
description: Sheeta, a young girl with a mysterious crystal amulet, escapes from pirates and a government agent with the help of Pazu, a boy who dreams of discovering the floating island Laputa. Together, they journey across a fantastical world in search of Laputa, encountering sky pirates, military plots, and ancient technology. Their adventure uncovers secrets of the past and tests the power of friendship, courage, and hope.

title: Grave of the Fireflies
description: Set during the final months of World War II, this heartbreaking tale follows teenage Seita and his younger sister Setsuko as they struggle to survive in wartime Japan after losing their home and family. As they face hunger, loss, and societal indifference, the film explores the cost of war through the eyes of innocent children. A deeply emotional film about love, responsibility, and the tragedy of war.

title: My Neighbor Totoro
description: Satsuki and Mei move to the countryside with their father while their mother recovers in the hospital. There, they encounter forest spirits, including the gentle and furry Totoro. As the sisters explore their surroundings, the magical creatures provide them comfort, fun, and support in difficult times. A heartwarming tale of childhood innocence, imagination, and nature.

title: Kiki's Delivery Service
description: At 13, Kiki begins her witch training and sets off to live independently with her talking cat, Jiji. In a seaside town, she starts a flying delivery service. But when she loses her powers due to self-doubt, Kiki must rediscover her confidence and purpose. A coming-of-age story about independence, growth, and self-belief.

title: Only Yesterday
description: Taeko, a 27-year-old Tokyo office worker, travels to the countryside and reflects on her childhood memories. As past and present merge, she confronts unresolved emotions and reconsiders her future. A gentle, introspective story about personal growth and the choices that shape our lives.

title: Porco Rosso
description: Marco, a World War I ace pilot cursed to look like a pig, now works as a bounty hunter in the Adriatic Sea. When he’s challenged by an arrogant American rival, he must repair his plane with help from the talented young engineer Fio. A romantic adventure with aerial dogfights, lost love, and reflections on heroism.

title: Pom Poko
description: A group of magical tanuki (raccoon dogs) band together to stop the destruction of their forest by urban development in Tokyo. Using shape-shifting powers and trickery, they struggle to reclaim their home and remind humans of nature’s spirit. A whimsical yet poignant environmental fable.

title: Whisper of the Heart
description: Shizuku, a book-loving teen, follows the name in her library cards to discover a boy named Seiji and an antique shop with a cat statue called Baron. As their bond grows, she writes a fantasy novel inspired by him. A sweet story of love, art, and finding your voice.

title: Princess Mononoke
description: Ashitaka, a cursed warrior, finds himself in a brutal conflict between the forest spirits led by wolf-raised San (Princess Mononoke) and humans exploiting nature. As he seeks peace, he uncovers deep ecological themes and the cost of industrialization. A powerful epic of nature vs. progress.

title: Spirited Away
description: Chihiro enters a magical bathhouse after her parents are turned into pigs. To save them, she must work under the witch Yubaba, face spirits like No-Face, and reclaim her identity. A surreal, emotional journey of resilience and self-discovery, and the only anime to win an Academy Award for Best Animated Feature.

title: The Cat Returns
description: Haru saves a cat and is whisked away to the Cat Kingdom to marry its prince. She’s aided by Baron and Muta to escape and rediscover her courage. A playful fantasy spin-off from Whisper of the Heart, full of charm and feline antics.

title: Howl's Moving Castle
description: Sophie, a shy hat maker, is cursed with old age by a jealous witch and finds refuge in a magical moving castle owned by the enigmatic wizard Howl. As war looms, Sophie discovers courage, magic, and love in a journey of transformation. A visually stunning tale about inner beauty and peace.

title: Ponyo
description: Ponyo, a goldfish who longs to become human, escapes her sea world and befriends a boy named Sosuke. Their bond upsets the balance of nature, leading to a magical flood. Inspired by The Little Mermaid, this colorful film celebrates love, nature, and childhood joy.

title: The Wind Rises
description: Jiro Horikoshi dreams of designing beautiful aircraft. Inspired by Italian engineer Caproni, he becomes a top plane designer in pre-WWII Japan. The film blends history and fantasy, exploring love, sacrifice, and the moral complexities of creation in wartime.
